thread.section_title: Citadines Bastille Marais Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very convenient
thread.title_full: Very convenient - Review of Citadines Bastille Marais Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Melinda G
title: Very convenient
text: A friend who had visited Paris, recommended this place to stay. It's very nice to have the kitchen as an option so we generally had a light breakfast in our room before heading out. The rooms are clean and the staff is friendly. We had read some reviews that said the wifi was not secure but seems to have changed.
